body.name: RiverRidge Brookfield Bathroom Two Shutter Door Floor Freestanding Storage Cabinet, White
features: Shutter door floor cabinet features two plantation-style shutter doors and rectangular, brushed nickel knobs for timeless style
Two interior adjustable shelves move up, down or out for a concealed storage space customized to your needs
Perfect for hiding toiletries and extra towels in the bathroom, or books and children’s toys in the living room
Doors close softly with adjustable, self-closing hinges for even door alignment and no loud slamming
Includes detailed assembly instructions and wall mounting hardware for added safety
body.description: Add stylish storage to any room with this shutter door floor cabinet. Featuring two plantation-style shutter doors and rectangular, brushed nickel knobs, this storage cabinet makes a timeless addition to bathrooms, laundry rooms, living rooms and more. Utilize the open top shelf to display your favorite decorative items, then open the double doors to reveal two interior adjustable shelves that move up, down or out for a storage space customized to your needs. Perfect for concealing toiletries and extra towels in the bathroom, or books and children’s toys in the living room. Doors close softly with adjustable, self-closing hinges for even door alignment and no loud slamming. Includes detailed assembly instructions and wall mounting hardware for added safety. Give your home an organizational makeover with the entire Brookfield Collection.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Complete the look with products from our Brookfield Collection! With our Brookfield Collection, you can create a beautifully organized bath or living space with concealed storage, open display shelves, and charming design elements of plantation shutter style doors and brushed nickel knobs. With its bright and clean white finish, this collection exudes a sense of freshness to your room, creating a timeless aesthetic that complements various decor styles. The Brookfield Collection features soft-close hinges to ensure smooth and silent operation, enhancing your user experience and adding a touch of luxury to your furniture. Behind its doors, you'll find convenient and concealed storage space, allowing you to keep your belongings organized and out of sight. The collection also includes open display shelves that not only offer functional storage but also allow you to express your personal style by providing the perfect space to showcase your favorite perfumes, lotions, and decorations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what I had hoped for! Put it on our outside patio and it works perfectly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Everything arrived in perfect condition. Easy enough to put together. Dowels are the loosest I've seen in build-it-yourself furniture but didn't cause a problem. Backing has annoying stickers that tear when attempting to peel off. No screw holes for the backing either, so be careful or else the screw will go in at an angle and break through the wood (see one of the pics, oops!). Hinges pictured in the manual are different that the ones included, have a problem with the left door being too low and scrapping as it shuts but the directions to pull the door up does nothing. Unsure what to do about that for now. The handles are uneven as a result.As far as the size of it, well I wish it was deeper. Shelves have a depth of 10.5 inches which I find slightly too shallow for my towels unless I fold them over again which just wastes more space vertically. My only major complaint really.
